name: This Game is a Dog
description:
"This game is your dog. He may not seem like a real dog, because he is made of text. But it is still your task to love and care for him."

This Game is Your Dog is a short Twine-based story-game about wordplay, the nature of ideas, and the power of the human imagination. Click on a hyperlink to make a choice. Refresh the page to start over. Use the fullscreen button to enter fullscreen mode and the scrollbars to scroll. This game is designed to run on computer browsers only.
